step.datasource: SELECT itemcode, ROUND(s.prijs83,3) as SalesPackagePrice , SalesPackagePrice as oldSPP FROM items i with (NOLOCK) inner join staffl s with (NOLOCK) on s.prijslijst = 'SALESPRICE' AND ISNULL(s.validfrom,'2000-01-01') < GETDATE() AND ISNULL(s.validto, '2099-12-31') > GETDATE() AND s.artcode= i.itemcode and s.AccountId IS NULL and s.kort_pbn = 'N' where ABS( ROUND(SalesPackagePrice,3) - ROUND(s.prijs83,3) ) > 0.01

SELECT itemcode, ROUND(s.prijs83,3) as SalesPackagePrice , SalesPackagePrice as oldSPP FROM items i with (NOLOCK) inner join staffl s with (NOLOCK) on s.prijslijst = 'SALESPRICE' AND ISNULL(s.validfrom,'2000-01-01') < GETDATE() AND ISNULL(s.validto, '2099-12-31') > GETDATE() AND s.artcode= i.itemcode and s.AccountId IS NULL and s.kort_pbn = 'N' where ABS( ROUND(SalesPackagePrice,3) - ROUND(s.prijs83,3) ) > 0.01

SELECT itemcode, ROUND(s.prijs83,3) as SalesPackagePrice , SalesPackagePrice as oldSPP FROM items i with (NOLOCK) inner join staffl s with (NOLOCK) on s.prijslijst = 'SALESPRICE' AND ISNULL(s.validfrom,'2000-01-01') < GETDATE() AND ISNULL(s.validto, '2099-12-31') > GETDATE() AND s.artcode= i.itemcode and s.AccountId IS NULL and s.kort_pbn = 'N' where ABS( ROUND(SalesPackagePrice,3) - ROUND(s.prijs83,3) ) > 0.01
